description:
Compassionate and successful, our team at Malloy Law Offices, LLC, has earned a reputation as leaders in personal injury law. At our office in Clinton, Maryland, as well as three others in Virginia and the Washington, D.C., area, we are committed to the following principles:

  • Integrity: We are honest with you at every step.
  • Professionalism: Our attorneys are respected throughout the legal community.
  • Accessibility: Our team is available to respond to your concerns and offers services in Spanish, English and Russian.
  • Affordability: We only collect a fee if we win your case.

The attorneys at our law firm hold honors that include being named in Lawyers of Distinction, listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100, listed in the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys' 10 Best and selected for inclusion in Super Lawyers.

Most importantly, we have steered countless people through some of the most challenging moments of their lives. Nursing home abuse, medical malpractice, car accidents and defective products have profound effects. Our attorneys recognize the many ways in which your life may have been changed due to your incident. Accordingly, we build a compelling case that targets maximum compensation. Since opening our doors, we have obtained more than $46 million in verdicts and settlements.

Malloy Law Offices, LLC, offers virtual appointments and free initial consultations.
